verses.verse: So these three <WH7969> men <WH582> ceased <WH7673> <WH8799> to answer <WH6030> <WH8800> I-yov <WH347>, because he was righteous <WH6662> in his own eyes <WH5869>.

Then was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> the wrath <WH639> of Elihu <WH453> the son <WH1121> of Barachel <WH1292> the Buzite <WH940>, of the kindred <WH4940> of Ram <WH7410>: against I-yov <WH347> was his wrath <WH639> kindled <WH2734> <WH8804>, because he justified <WH6663> <WH8763> himself <WH5315> rather than 'Elohim <WH430>.

Also against his three <WH7969> friends <WH7453> was his wrath <WH639> kindled <WH2734> <WH8804>, because they had found <WH4672> <WH8804> no answer <WH4617>, and yet had condemned <WH7561> <WH8686> I-yov <WH347>.
Now Elihu <WH453> had waited <WH2442> <WH8765> till I-yov <WH347> had spoken <WH1697>, because they were elder <WH2205> <WH3117> than he.
When Elihu <WH453> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that there was no answer <WH4617> in the mouth <WH6310> of these three <WH7969> men <WH582>, then his wrath <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799>.

And Elihu <WH453> the son <WH1121> of Barachel <WH1292> the Buzite <WH940> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am young <WH6810> <WH3117>, and ye are very old <WH3453>; wherefore I was afraid <WH2119> <WH8804>, and durst <WH3372> <WH8799> not shew <WH2331> <WH8763> you mine opinion <WH1843>.
I said <WH559> <WH8804>, Days <WH3117> should speak <WH1696> <WH8762>, and multitude <WH7230> of years <WH8141> should teach <WH3045> <WH8686> wisdom <WH2451>.
But <WH403> there is a spirit <WH7307> in man <WH582>: and the inspiration <WH5397> of 'El SHaddai <WH7706> giveth them understanding <WH995> <WH8799>.
Great men <WH7227> are not always wise <WH2449> <WH8799>: neither do the aged <WH2205> understand <WH995> <WH8799> judgment <WH4941>.
Therefore I said <WH559> <WH8804>, Hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> to me; I also will shew <WH2331> <WH8762> mine opinion <WH1843>.
Behold, I waited <WH3176> <WH8689> for your words <WH1697>; I gave ear <WH238> <WH8686> to your reasons <WH8394>, whilst ye searched out <WH2713> <WH8799> what to say <WH4405>.
Yea, I attended <WH995> <WH8709> unto you, and, behold, there was none of you that convinced <WH3198> <WH8688> I-yov <WH347>, or that answered <WH6030> <WH8802> his words <WH561>:
Lest ye should say <WH559> <WH8799>, We have found out <WH4672> <WH8804> wisdom <WH2451>: 'Elohim <WH410> thrusteth him down <WH5086> <WH8799>, not man <WH376>.
Now he hath not directed <WH6186> <WH8804> his words <WH4405> against me: neither will I answer <WH7725> <WH8686> him with your speeches <WH561>.
They were amazed <WH2865> <WH8804>, they answered <WH6030> <WH8804> no more: they left off <WH6275> <WH8689> speaking <WH4405>.
When I had waited <WH3176> <WH8689>, (for they spake <WH1696> <WH8762> not, but stood still <WH5975> <WH8804>, and answered <WH6030> <WH8804> no more;)
I said, I will answer <WH6030> <WH8799> also my part <WH2506>, I also will shew <WH2331> <WH8762> mine opinion <WH1843>.
For I am full <WH4390> <WH8804> of matter <WH4405>, the spirit <WH7307> within <WH990> me constraineth <WH6693> <WH8689> me.
Behold, my belly <WH990> is as wine <WH3196> which hath no vent <WH6605> <WH8735>; it is ready to burst <WH1234> <WH8735> like new <WH2319> bottles <WH178>.
I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762>, that I may be refreshed <WH7304> <WH8799>: I will open <WH6605> <WH8799> my lips <WH8193> and answer <WH6030> <WH8799>.
Let me not, I pray you, accept <WH5375> <WH8799> any man's <WH376> person <WH6440>, neither let me give flattering titles <WH3655> <WH8762> unto man <WH120>.
For I know <WH3045> <WH8804> not to give flattering titles <WH3655> <WH8762>; in so doing my maker <WH6213> <WH8802> would soon <WH4592> take me away <WH5375> <WH8799>.
